Dictionary.description: -- Definition -- A code list for the National Monuments Record classification scheme.

Definition.description: -- Definition -- The Protected Site is classified as an agricultural or subsistence monument under the National Monuments Record classification scheme.
Definition.name: agricultureAndSubsistence

Definition.description: -- Definition -- The Protected Site is classified as a civil monument under the National Monuments Record classification scheme.
Definition.name: civil

Definition.description: -- Definition -- The Protected Site is classified as a commemorative monument under the National Monuments Record classification scheme.
Definition.name: commemorative

Definition.description: -- Definition -- The Protected Site is classified as a commercial monument under the National Monuments Record classification scheme.
Definition.name: commercial

Definition.description: -- Definition -- The Protected Site is classified as a communications monument under the National Monuments Record classification scheme.
Definition.name: communications

Definition.description: -- Definition -- The Protected Site is classified as a defence monument under the National Monuments Record classification scheme.
Definition.name: defence

Definition.description: -- Definition -- The Protected Site is classified as a domestic monument under the National Monuments Record classification scheme.
Definition.name: domestic

Definition.description: -- Definition -- The Protected Site is classified as a education monument under the National Monuments Record classification scheme.
Definition.name: education

Definition.description: -- Definition -- The Protected Site is classified as a garden, park or urban space monument under the National Monuments Record classification scheme.
Definition.name: gardensParksAndUrbanSpaces

Definition.description: -- Definition -- The Protected Site is classified as a health and welfare monument under the National Monuments Record classification scheme.
Definition.name: healthAndWelfare

Definition.description: -- Definition -- The Protected Site is classified as a industrial monument under the National Monuments Record classification scheme.
Definition.name: industrial

Definition.description: -- Definition -- The Protected Site is classified as a maritime monument under the National Monuments Record classification scheme.
Definition.name: maritime

Definition.description: -- Definition -- The Protected Site is classified as a monument with some unclassified form under the National Monuments Record classification scheme.
Definition.name: monument

Definition.description: -- Definition -- The Protected Site is classified as a recreational monument under the National Monuments Record classification scheme.
Definition.name: recreational

Definition.description: -- Definition -- The Protected Site is classified as a religious, ritual or funerary monument under the National Monuments Record classification scheme.
Definition.name: religiousRitualAndFunerary

Definition.description: -- Definition -- The Protected Site is classified as a settlement under the National Monuments Record classification scheme.
Definition.name: settlement

Definition.description: -- Definition -- The Protected Site is classified as a transport monument under the National Monuments Record classification scheme.
Definition.name: transport

Definition.description: -- Definition -- The Protected Site is classified as a water supply and drainage monument under the National Monuments Record classification scheme.
Definition.name: waterSupplyAndDrainage
